title: Dungeons & Dragons Therapy Session #5
description:
Dr. Kirk Honda and Humberto demonstrate D&D therapy with Adam Johns and Adam Davis, from Game To Grow -- a nonprofit that helps youth through games. In this session, Thrain, Grollo, and Shoosh meet some sketchy individuals...

The Psychology In Seattle Podcast.

March 1, 2019.

Email: Contact@PsychologyInSeattle.com

Access archive at: https://psychologyinseattle.squarespace.com

Become a patron of our podcast by going to https://www.patreon.com/PsychologyInSeattle

Music by Bread Knife Incident.
